m_szDocTitle: Europe Electric Car Sales Booming | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Europe Electric Car Sales Booming Originally published on EV Obsession . The European electric vehicle (EV) market is continuing to see strong growth, based on registrations during March — with roughly 18,000 units registered, blowing past the old monthly record (set in December 2013) for the old continent. The old record was 14,197 units registered. As it stands, more than 36,000 EVs have been registered in the European market this year — putting the market (if things continue this way) roughly on track to top 150,000 units in 2015.
